net.vortexdata.tsqpf.modules

Class PluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.vortexdata.tsqpf.modules.PluginManager

  • public class PluginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads, unloads and manages all plugins in the plugin directory.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael Wiesinger

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disableAll()
      Unloads all loaded plugins and disables them, preparing for save shutdown.
      void enableAll()
      Runs through the plugin directory and tries to load and enable all plugins.
      static java.util.List<PluginContainer> getLoadedplugins()
      Returns a list of all loaded plugins
      void loadPlugin(java.io.File file)
      Loads a specific plugin and tries to enable it.
